Record.ClassificationPath: Cardiovascular Diseases/Heart Diseases/Heart Valve Diseases/Pulmonary Valve Stenosis
Cardiovascular Diseases/Heart Diseases/Ventricular Outflow Obstruction/Pulmonary Valve Stenosis
Record.Description: The pathologic narrowing of the orifice of the PULMONARY VALVE. This lesion restricts blood outflow from the RIGHT VENTRICLE to the PULMONARY ARTERY. When the trileaflet valve is fused into an imperforate membrane, the blockage is complete.
